title: Unable to log in to the OCE Merch store
body:
We're aware of an issue where some players attempting to log in to the [OCE Merch Store](https://oce.merch.riotgames.com/en/), receive the error message: "ERROR Looks like this email address is already registered for another account. Please try again with a different email."

You'll still be able to browse the store and purchase merch, but only as a guest account that has to be filled out each time you make a purchase.

For now, if you're experiencing this issue and would like it resolved then please [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Your ticket should be escalated and the support team will take you through some options to resolve the issue.

replies.body:
Hey 

I put a ticket in and no reply and it's been a week and at this rate I will miss out on the PROJECT hoodie. HELP :)

> [{quoted}](name=Little Kitsune,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1AqeVZZv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-17T23:14:05.037+0000)

You should be receiving a response either today or tomorrow. G'luck!
